promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young epic serpent water-type pokemon wearing a regal crystal headband. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquadrazi, a a chibi young epic serpent water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Dragonblade, Psychic Fangs. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "water" or "Aquadrazi". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, serpent-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: This whimsical sea-dwelling drakeling uses its Dragonblade tail and Psychic Fangs to playfully navigate ocean realms, casting enchanting waves as it glides.
